title: Best Presenter – Global IME Bank AI/ML Hackathon 2025
description: Developed DocLipi: an intelligent OCR and document classifier for Nepali and English texts, powered by vision LLMs.

title: 1st Runner-up – Jiffy Hackathon
description: Reimagined the JIFFY App with AI-based food recommendations, AR menu previews, games, and short-form reels.
